name: Kevin Ravensberg
cooked: We’ve found a way to make Trezor Suite allow CoinJoin again with alternative coordinators, a guide how to set it up has been written here: Change Coordinator (kravens.nl) Basically starting the Trezor Suite app with a debug argument setting a custom coordinator server, with an example given for connecting to the Noderunners Coordinator.
topic_title: Who will run the CoinJoin coordinators?
topic_html_title: Who will run the CoinJoin coordinators?
raw:
We've found a way to make Trezor Suite allow CoinJoin again with alternative coordinators, a guide how to set it up has been written here: [Change Coordinator (kravens.nl)](https://wasabi.kravens.nl/#trezor)
Basically starting the Trezor Suite app with a debug argument setting a custom coordinator server, with an example given for connecting to the Noderunners Coordinator.
